no-console-pii.description: Disallow logging of personally identifiable information
no-console-pii.message: PII (Personally Identifiable Information) should not be logged in production

require-encryption-comment.description: Require encryption comments for sensitive data handling
require-encryption-comment.message: Sensitive healthcare data must include encryption comment: // LGPD: Encrypted at rest

no-hardcoded-api-keys.description: Disallow hardcoded API keys or secrets
no-hardcoded-api-keys.message: API keys and secrets must be stored in environment variables

require-patient-consent.description: Require patient consent validation for data processing
require-patient-consent.message: Patient data processing must include consent validation
